welcomePage.DiscriptionOne: "This project, created as part of training at the RS School, is dedicated to React. This school helps to learn different languages ​and frameworks.
welcomePage.DescriptionThree: You don't have to watch the application of our team, which was made as part of the final task. This application will help to manage projects, as it allows you to review tasks and see at what stage this or that task is.‚Äù
welcomePage.descriptionSchool:
RS School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community
since 2013.

Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence.

The mentors and trainers of their school are front-end and javascript developers from different companies and countries.
welcomePage.doEvgeny: Hello, my name is Zhenya and in this project I have done: Backend (CI/CD), Footer, Boarder route
welcomePage.doTatiana: Hello, my name is Tatiana and in this project I have done: Header, Create new board, Main route, Boarder route
welcomePage.doElizaveta: Hello, my name is Liza and in this project I have done: Welcome page, Sign In / Sign Up, Boarder route
